summary: Completed comprehensive testing of VoiceMirror live voice clone stream app. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI and core functionality work well, but OpenAI realtime integration has endpoint path mismatch and API key compatibility issues.

integration_issues.issue: Emergent LLM key not compatible with OpenAI realtime API
integration_issues.impact: Voice cloning features cannot initialize properly
integration_issues.details: API returns 'Incorrect API key provided' error when using Emergent LLM key

integration_issues.issue: Frontend calls wrong realtime endpoint path
integration_issues.details: Frontend tries to access '/api/v1/realtime/session' but backend serves '/api/realtime/session'

passed_tests: JWT token authentication and protected routes
Dashboard with user profile and statistics display
Call creation with email invitation system

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (core functionality works, realtime integration has issues)

high_priority: Fix OpenAI realtime API integration - either update Emergent LLM key configuration or use proper OpenAI API key for realtime features
medium_priority: Update frontend CallInterface.js to use correct realtime endpoint path (/api/realtime/session instead of /api/v1/realtime/session)
